subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Bill Hampton Award is presented to the rookie “who best exemplifies a ‘Pro’ in the locker room.” The winner’s jersey hangs for a year, and in plain view of players milling about their lockers.
snippet: The Bill Hampton Award is presented to the rookie “who best exemplifies a ‘Pro’ in the locker room.” The winner’s jersey hangs for a year, and in plain view of players milling about their lockers.
